T02D2156:251b-1: ma rin ma ri aa mri ta n'a ma /
T02D2156:251b-3: bsad pa bdud rtsi'i gso ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2156:251b-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2156:251b-5: bsad pa gso bam byas na //
T02D2156:251b-6: gang zhig la ni sdig pa dang //
T02D2156:251b-7: gang zhig shin tu khros 'gyur ba //
T02D2156:251b-8: de phyir gso ba'i cho ga dran //
T02D2156:252a-2: phyogs bzhi padma'i steng du ni //
T02D2156:252a-3: 'bras phye'u rgyu las byung ba yi //
T02D2156:252a-4: tsandan chus bkrus sbrus pa yis //
T02D2156:252a-5: rigs bzhi klu yi gzugs gzhag ste //
T02D2156:252a-6: gdong pa mtshal gyis byug par bya //
T02D2156:252a-7: btsun mo bzhi dang khye'u bzhi //
T02D2156:252a-8: bu mo bzhi yi gzugs kyang gzhag / de dag mdzes pa'i gzugs bya'o //
T02D2156:252a-9: padma'i lte bar rin chen lnga //
T02D2156:252a-10: mtshams kyi padma bzhi po la //
T02D2156:252a-11: dkar ser dmar ser bud med kyi //
T02D2156:252a-12: 'o ma bzhi ni mtsho bzhi ste //
T02D2156:252a-13: der ni klu gzugs sna tshogs gzhag / ljang gu dar gyis steng dgab po //
T02D2156:252a-14: de nas rang lha'i sa bon las //
T02D2156:252a-15: 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu las //
T02D2156:252a-16: 'ga' zhig rnam smin lus bor ba //
T02D2156:252a-17: bar do'i sems de bkug byas te //
T02D2156:252a-18: dri chu yis ni gnyis ka bsang //
T02D2156:252a-19: gzugs la bstim zhing 'o mar bdar //
T02D2156:252a-20: sna tshogs sman gyis gtor bar bya //
T02D2156:252a-21: de ltar dgug pa lan gsum bya //
T02D2156:252a-22: de ltar gso ba phyi nang gnyis //
T02D2156:252a-24: 'ga' zhig sems kyi bag chags sbyangs //
T02D2156:252a-25: lce yi rdo rje lte bar aa //
T02D2156:252a-26: aa yi 'od zer phus btab pas //
T02D2156:252a-27: 'ga' zhig sems kyi aa la thim //
T02D2156:252a-28: bdud rtsi'i rgyun phab sems gso'o //
T02D2156:252a-29: sems dang shes pa dran gsal bsam //
T02D2156:252a-31: klu brgyad 'khor bcas khyed rnams kun //
T02D2156:252a-32: sems dang shes pa gsal gyur cig / lus dang
T02D2156:252a-33: dbang po rgyas gyur cig / drin lan dam tshig
T02D2156:252a-34: dran gyis la // bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar //
T02D2156:252a-35: shin tu khros pa zhi gyur cig //
T02D2156:252a-36: de ltar rim pas lan gsum bar //
T02D2156:252a-37: de ni nang gi gso ba yin //
T02D2156:252a-38: de nas mngar gsum 'bras chan mar //
T02D2156:252a-39: gser dang khyi yi 'o ma dang //
T02D2156:252a-40: n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa'i //
T02D2156:252a-41: gso ba'i sman ni sna tshogs bsags //
T02D2156:252a-42: bdud rtsi'i 'o rgyun byin brlabs te //
T02D2156:252a-43: de yi nyams pa rnams sos bsam //
T02D2156:252a-44: gso sman la sogs rim pa ni //
T02D2156:252a-45: mchod cing 'di skad brjod par bya //
T02D2156:252a-46: h'um nga ni thugs rje chen po yi //
T02D2156:252a-47: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas //
T02D2156:252a-48: gso ba'i bdud rtsi rgyun phab nas //
T02D2156:252a-49: klu brgyad 'khor bcas khyed rnams kun //
T02D2156:252a-50: drag po'i sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2156:252a-51: bsreg dang btso ba'i sdug bsngal dang//
T02D2156:252b-0: @252b mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D2156:252b-1: bsnun zhing gtubs pa'i sdug bsngal dang //
T02D2156:252b-2: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong //
T02D2156:252b-3: 'chi med gso ba'i sman tshogs kyis //
T02D2156:252b-4: bsregs shing btsos pa sos gyur cig //
T02D2156:252b-5: bsnun zhing gtubs pa sos gyur cig / lus dang
T02D2156:252b-6: dbang po rgyas gyur cig / mthu stobs ldan zhing
T02D2156:252b-7: bde gyur shog / sdug bsngal kun las thar bar
T02D2156:252b-8: shog / byang chub sems bskyed dga' sems ldan //
T02D2156:252b-9: dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul du //
T02D2156:252b-10: mkho dgu longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02D2156:252b-11: 'dod pa thams cad ldan gyur cig //
T02D2156:252b-12: nyams pa'i lus sogs rgyas gyur cig / yan lag
T02D2156:252b-13: thams cad bde gyur cig / klu nad thams cad
T02D2156:252b-14: sos gyur nas // sdug bsngal nad las thar bar shog / ngan song gsum las thar nas ni //
T02D2156:252b-15: tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan gyur te //
T02D2156:252b-16: chos spyod dbang po thul nas ni //
T02D2156:252b-17: phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong shog /'jigs pa kun
T02D2156:252b-18: las skyabs ldan shog / longs spyod chen po thob
T02D2156:252b-19: gyur cig / sngags dang sman sogs byin rlabs kyis
T02D2156:252b-20: // nad dang nyer 'tshe kun sos pas //
T02D2156:252b-21: drin lan dam tshig dran par gyis //
T02D2156:252b-22: phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ma 'da' //
T02D2156:252b-23: zhe sdang gdug pa zhi gyur la //
T02D2156:252b-24: de ring che ge mo la ni //
T02D2156:252b-25: bsam ngan sbyor rtsub zhi gyur cig / klus byas
T02D2156:252b-26: bcings pa grol gyur cig / legs bsams thams cad
T02D2156:252b-27: 'grub pa dang // dar zhing rgyas pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D2156:252b-28: n'a ga r'a dza phu:sh'intam ku ru sv'a h'a zhes pa'i tshig //
T02D2156:252b-29: rim pas kun nas gdags par bya //
T02D2156:252b-30: gdengs ka'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni //
T02D2156:252b-31: dam tshig 'di yis bsgrag par bya //
T02D2156:252b-32: h'um nga ni phyag na rdo rje ste //
T02D2156:252b-33: klu brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa nyon ;
T02D2156:252b-34: / chos bshad bden pa mi nyan dang //
T02D2156:252b-35: rig sngags rgyal po'i bka' bcag na //
T02D2156:252b-36: gso ba'i sman ni thams cad kun //
T02D2156:252b-37: mtshon cha'i char du gyur nas ni //
T02D2156:252b-38: lus kyi gnad la gzir bar byed //
T02D2156:252b-39: bsad cing bcad cing dum bur 'gyur //
T02D2156:252b-40: mngar gsum la sogs gtor ma yang //
T02D2156:252b-41: dug chen ha lar gyur nas ni //
T02D2156:252b-42: myos dang rmongs par gyur nas ni //
T02D2156:252b-43: tshab chen pos gzir bar byed //
T02D2156:252b-44: de bas dus rnams thams cad du //
T02D2156:252b-45: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu srungs //
T02D2156:252b-46: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra sa ma ya n'a ga raksha raksha h'um phat //
T02D2156:252b-47: de 'dra'i mchod pa gsum byas te //
T02D2156:253a-2: cho ga'i rim pas gtang bar bya //
T02D2156:253a-3: de ni phyi yi gso ba yin //
T02D2156:253a-4: nyams dga' ba yi gzhal yas khang //
T02D2156:253a-5: 'dzam gling pho brang chen po ste //
T02D2156:253a-6: rten yod gnas su dam du sba //
T02D2156:253a-7: thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2156:253a-8: gso ba'i de ni rim pa ste ;
T02D2156:253a-9: / cho ga 'di ni shin tu legs //
T02D2156:253a-10: bdag gis man ngag rim pa 'di //
T02D2156:253a-11: gang zhig 'ga' la phan phyir byas //
T02D2156:253a-12: zla ba lta bu gang thob des //
